lead_paragraph: This version of the story returns to the popular, but discredited belief that dozens of people deliberately ignored the cries of Ms. Genovese.

headline.main: Review: ‘37,’ a Fictional Retelling of the Kitty Genovese Story

snippet: This version of the story returns to the popular, but discredited belief that dozens of people deliberately ignored the cries of Ms. Genovese....
abstract: Andy Webster reviews movie 37, directed by Puk Grasten.
